comment: She's really amazing. Not a tough grader. She's lenient with due dates, just negotiate and explain your situation. Do the work and you'll pass.

Dr. Disbrow was very clear about what she expected and it is manageable. She gives so many opportunities to do well on assignments and she gives great feedback. I would be honored to take this class again.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria
